data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Tikamgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tikamgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Tikamgarh hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Tikamgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Tikamgarh words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Yadav Nandbans people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Yadav Nandbans people know you.
Father, give the disciples of the the county of Tikamgarh an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Tikamgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: There are 1,445,200 people living in the county of Tikamgarh. Only about 15,897 might be believers.

location.name: Tikamgarh
location.people_groups_list: Soiri, Rajput Dangi, Rajput Rawat, Rajput Bundela, Chunpach
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Soiri (84,000), Rajput Dangi (53,000), Rajput Rawat (92,000), Rajput Bundela (99,000), Chunpach (1,200)
